com.acs.smartcard
Interface Reader.OnStateChangeListener

Enclosing class:
Reader
public static interface Reader.OnStateChangeListener

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the state of reader is changed.

Method Summary
 void onStateChange(int slotNum, int prevState, int currState)
          Called when the state of reader had been changed.
 

Method Detail

onStateChange

void onStateChange(int slotNum,
                   int prevState,
                   int currState)
Called when the state of reader had been changed.

Parameters:
slotNum - the slot number.
prevState - the previous state.
currState - the current state.
